root.message: The OTHER_DOC field for indicator 14-5-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
Legislative Diploma 46/71 creation of the Bazaruto National Park

Decree 39/2001 extension of the limits of the Bazaruto Archipelago National Park

Decree 14/2002 creation of the Quirimbas national park

Diploma Legislativo 46/71 criação do parque Nacional de Bazaruto

Decreto 39/2001 extensão dos limites do Parque Nacional de Arquipélago de Bazaruto

Decreto 14/2002 criação do parque nacional das Quirimbas
